title: UNP leader questions Lakshman Seneviratne
content: DM Online – By Kelum Bandara and Yohan Perera UNP Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe at the last UNP parliamentary group meeting had made enquiries from MP Lakshman Seneviratne as to why he had given evidence against DNA Leader MP Sarath Fonseka before the first Court Martial. The Court Martial stripped the former army commander of his…
